projects.title: Venituri de 7 cifre – B2B SEO & Performance Marketing în 10 luni
projects.title_en: 7-Figure Revenue – B2B SEO & Performance Marketing in 10 months
projects.description: Obținerea de venituri de 7 cifre prin strategii de Performance Marketing și SEO. A B2B niche company needed increased online visibility and sales, facing challenges with low organic traffic and reduced retention rates.

projects.title: Creștere de 400% – Creșterea veniturilor unui brand de e-commerce în 12 luni
projects.title_en: 400% Growth – E-Commerce Brand Revenue Surge in 12 Months
projects.description: The agency helped an e-commerce brand address low conversion rates and stagnant growth through funnel optimization and creative refresh. The strategy focused on improving the customer purchase journey and increasing revenues through market analysis, sales funnel simplification, upsell tactics, and visual storytelling.

projects.title: ROI de 5X – Extinderea unei Platforme SaaS în 9 luni
projects.title_en: 5X ROI – SaaS Platform Expansion in 9 Months
projects.description: Helping a growing SaaS platform expand its user base rapidly and improve marketing ROI without excessively increasing acquisition costs. The agency conducted a comprehensive audit of paid campaigns, refined audience targeting with detailed demographic and behavioral segmentation, performed iterative creative testing, and implemented advanced retargeting strategies including dynamic advertisements and sequential messaging.

projects.title: Creștere de 10x – Brand DTC de la 250.000 USD la 2,5M USD în 14 luni
projects.title_en: 10x Growth – DTC Brand from $250K to $2.5M in 14 Months
projects.description: An e-commerce direct-to-consumer brand faced stagnating growth and high acquisition costs. The agency implemented scalable strategies to increase revenue and optimize customer acquisition while improving sales funnel performance.

projects.title: Space Philosophy
projects.description: Space Philosophy is a premium interior design agency and furniture acquisition consultancy operating across Europe and Asia. Nesco Digital created a website to showcase their mission, work and services with custom layouts and functionality matching the client's sophisticated brand positioning.

projects.title: Roca Ceramics CSR
projects.description: O campanie de CSR tare dragă nouă care și-a propus creșterea gradului de conștientizare și responsabilitate în ceea ce privește consumul de apă, punând accent pe economisirea apei prin limitarea consumului cu ajutorul bateriilor eco-friendly Roca. The initiative partnered with the Architecture University to organize events communicating the benefits of Roca products for reducing water consumption.

projects.title: Sub-Zero & Wolf
projects.description: The client requested a modern, solid, and easy-to-manage website to showcase their product portfolio. The agency implemented a minimalist and intuitive design as a market differentiator. Content is structured from the user's perspective to facilitate navigation, with extensive product documentation organized by customer needs.

projects.title: Today x Gladiatorul
projects.client: Fundația Gladiatorul / Elvan – Today / Smart Finance
projects.description: CSR campaign in partnership with Gladiatorul Association (founded by Szobi Cseh) and a major hypermarket chain with over 700 stores in Romania to reduce violence and combat youth delinquency in rural children while offering occupational perspectives and skills in fields such as utility climbing, film stunt work, performance sports, and professional military activities.

projects.title: MonicaGeoroceanu.com
projects.description: A captivating project about a wellness and personal development platform. The platform aims to inspire achieving a state of excellence and share advice on physical, mental and emotional well-being. An attractive design, clear structure, and easy navigation were key deliverables.

projects.title: Watchmakers
projects.description: Un website cu un design minimalist și funcțional. Scopul a fost de a ne concentra pe o foarte bună direcționare a fluxului de informații în schimbul utilizării unor imagini și structuri complicate. (A website featuring minimalist and functional design, focused on directing information flow effectively rather than relying on complex imagery and structures.)

projects.title: Campanie Employer Branding
projects.description: The project focused on presenting Metro Systems as a positive, friendly workplace emphasizing human elements alongside professional development and work-life balance. The campaign featured IT professionals' work and hobbies in a video with influencer George Buhnici, supported by multi-platform paid advertising campaigns.

projects.title: BellaCasa Residence
projects.description: The client set high expectations for visual appeal and functionality of vilecaseieftine.ro. The team implemented an airy layout with easy-to-follow imagery and colors that convey relevant, impactful messages.

projects.title: ETQ – Minimalist Story
projects.description: Comunicarea unui concept de modă minimalistă printr-un site simplu și aerisit, dar cu suficient impact în prezentarea și susținerea filozofiei brandului, atragerii cumpărătorilor și generării de vânzări. (Conveying a minimalist fashion concept through a simple, airy site with sufficient impact in presenting brand philosophy, attracting buyers, and generating sales.)

projects.title: Labianca Architecttura
projects.description: Creating a website for an architecture studio. The challenge centered on effectively communicating the studio's narrative, aesthetic identity, and brand. Cohesive branding elements including typography, color schemes, imagery, and tone create a compelling and inspiring user experience.

projects.title: Azzurro
projects.description: The team aimed to convey the welcoming atmosphere of storytelling with masks, velvet, and impeccable décor, refined cuisine, and carefully selected elegant dishes found in an Italian restaurant chain through the website design.

projects.title: Babyphoria
projects.description: Cu o misiune minunată, Babyphoria se poziționează ca un univers îndrăzneț, unic și interesant pentru copii în care a avea educație estetică, a fi autentic și inspirațional devine un stil de viață. The team created an online store that authentically represented the brand's vision.

projects.title: Înghețata P&P
projects.description: P&P aduce bucurie și încântare indiferent de timp și anotimp. (P&P brings joy and delight regardless of time and season.) The team created a vibrant website featuring persuasive messaging, clear content, and appetizing imagery to attract prospective customers.

projects.title: Diverse proiecte de branding
projects.client: Multiple (Azzurro, Alkan, Bella Casa, Dent Estet, Luxury Interiors)
projects.industry: Multiple (FMCG, Retail, Real Estate, IT&C, Hospitality)
projects.description: Ne place să construim branduri care se impun prin autenticitate, memorabilitate și o conexiune puternică cu audiența lor. (We enjoy constructing brands distinguished through authenticity, memorability, and potent audience connection.) A collection of branding projects across multiple industries.

projects.title: Creșterea numărului de rezervări
projects.description: The client faced challenges with customers comparing offerings across approximately 15 different websites before finalizing bookings. A digital strategy was developed targeting multiple hotel chains (Ibis, Pullman, and Sofitel) across the United Kingdom, Ireland, France, Spain, and Portugal. PPC campaigns were supported by email marketing with continuous optimization, and email remarketing flows were implemented to recover abandoned bookings.

projects.title: Îmbunătățirea calității lead-urilor
projects.description: The agency addressed inefficiencies in existing Google AdWords campaigns plagued by duplicate keywords, poor budget allocation, and inflated costs-per-click. They distinguished between high-intent and lower-intent searchers, then through account restructuring, conversion tracking, A/B testing, and landing page optimization improved lead quality while maintaining cost-effectiveness.

projects.title: Clinica stomatologică Zahn Pioch
projects.description: The brief outlined a need for a new minimalist yet bold design that would appeal to and serve the needs of a new generation. The agency developed a website responsive to these requirements including an appointment scheduling system.

projects.title: Brand de Hairstyling
projects.description: Brief-ul a constat în dezvoltarea unui site pentru un brand avangardist de hairstyling, cu un concept inovator. R & Co este despre experiența vizuală. Ambalajele și parfumurile au fost concepute pentru a maximiza experiența și a transmite un sentiment, stimula simțurile sau a te transpune într-un alt loc. (Creating an avant-garde hairstyling brand website with innovative design, emphasizing visual experience and sensory engagement.)

projects.title: Targetarea unui nou public țintă
projects.description: The challenge involved expanding sales from new leads through programmatic ads targeting potential customers without prior site interaction. The agency analyzed anonymized behavioral and interest data from existing customers to identify new prospective buyers based on demographic profiles and user behaviors, resulting in a high-precision programmatic display campaign.

projects.title: Remediere probleme de conversie
projects.description: The client faced two critical challenges: an outdated website that hindered UX and poor conversion rates, and suboptimal lead quality (less than one-third of mailed packages converted). The agency used agile methodology to create a new landing page while redesigning the main site. The simplified, elegant landing page proved highly effective, driving substantial improvements within months. Eight months into the campaign, all paid traffic continued directing to this landing page.

projects.title: Urban Gang
projects.description: We helped our client to develop a high-end curated fashion web platform based on affiliation marketing. We also helped them to develop their own brand and various marketing materials.

projects.title: Strategie digitală și dezvoltare web
projects.description: The client operated five separate websites with fragmented branding and service offerings. Key challenges included service offers displayed across five different sites with distinct branding, lack of lead-generation configuration with missing CTAs, declining site traffic without conversions, and customer unawareness of integrated service offerings. The strategic solution focused on adapting a new brand identity for web, creating a conversion funnel, and integrating multiple sub-brands into one cohesive platform.

projects.title: Luxury Interiors
projects.description: Our client needed a new presentation website to emphasize the new projects they had been working on and also turn their interior design services into a quality statement.

projects.title: Bellacasa
projects.description: Bella Casa continued its digital transformation journey by redesigning its website to integrate online orders with their ERP system for faster order processing (integrating online requests with ERP to process orders as quickly as possible).

projects.title: Roca
projects.description: Roca needed a new global website to unify all digital assets and showcase the whole range of products as detailed as possible in order to help branches and retail clients.

projects.title: Tastimo App
projects.description: The client aimed to revolutionize the dining-out experience by developing an application that identifies nearby restaurant options while enabling users to share culinary moments with friends and food enthusiasts. The agency developed a descriptive logo to communicate the app's purpose and attract user interest.

projects.title: Novaintermed
projects.description: The client wanted to mark 20 years on the market with a website transformation. The agency proposed a simple, elegant design with Magento back-end for order and logistics management.
